long_description: The high capacity, ultralight Nathan Zeal 2L Hydration Vest is specifically engineered for women. It comes with a SpeedDraw flask and a patented system that stabilizes fit and helps eliminate bounce. Designed specifically to fit the female form, the 3-way Propulsion Harness(TM) stabilizes side-to-side and up/down movement of bladder and contents for a bounce-free ride. Equipped with one 18 fl.oz. SpeedDraw flask in right pocket; 1 front bottle pocket and 1 front zip smartphone-compatible pocket; left front stash pocket fits several gels. Gusseted stretch mesh rear pocket for increased capacity; pill pocket for electrolyte tabs; internal stash pocket and key clip. Wall mesh shoulder straps are highly breathable; perforated back panel for breathability and weight reduction. The Nathan Zeal 2L Hydration Vest features rear external shockcord for increased capacity, easy on/off with full side adjustability and reflective trims.
short_description: The high capacity, ultralight Nathan Zeal 2L Hydration Vest is specifically engineered for women. It comes with a SpeedDraw flask and a patented system that stabilizes fit and helps eliminate bounce.
